analysis:
Entries in Art and design subjects have decreased sharply across the UK over the last four years. The -66.2% change compared to a change of -48.5% in all AS-Level entries over the last four years.

Across the UK, a smaller proportion of students achieved the top grades in Art and design subjects in 2017 compared to all AS-Level subjects. A total of 21.5% of pupils achieved A grades in Art and design subjects compared to 2014% for all subjects.
